Reviews.Title: slow start, winning finish
Reviews.Author: E. Mullins
Reviews.Content: This is a fine camera.  The most problems are in the documentation.........there isn't much.  Once I got by the mixed translation and installed the new firmware, the camera did everything I needed it to do.......for a good price.

ProductInfo.Features:
P2P function mean peer to peer; Not need  DDNS setting.
Not need Router forward port setting.
Real plug & play ,no need any network setting in router.
P2P  IP camera only one ID can be seen anywhere.
Not need worry for any network setting from now; M-JPEG Compress format.
ProductInfo.Name: KARE N5402jv P2P Indoor and Outdoor Black Wireless Wi-fi IP Network Security Camera with M-jpeg Compress Format 1/4" Cmos Sensor Audio P/T 355° 120° android iPhone View by Freedom Island
